message.raw:
Fix bug with spurious error being printed to the terminal
when runmanager automatically goes into edit mode for the value or
units column because they are blank. The error was caused by the tableview
already being in edit mode, so it can't go into edit mode again.
message.html:

message:
Fix bug with spurious error being printed to the terminal
when runmanager automatically goes into edit mode for the value or
units column because they are blank. The error was caused by the tableview
already being in edit mode, so it can't go into edit mode again.
